item.title: Clustering
item.description: shiny app that iterates through k-means clustering refresher on euclidean distance

item.title: Randomness is the Stock Market
item.description: Stock markets behave in opposite ways depending on whether you're perspective is micro- or macroscopic. It's easy to forecast that our economy will be bigger in the distant future than it is now, but difficult to estimate where it will be in a month. As a result, it's harder to trade profitable options than it is to make profitable long-term trades in index funds. This article explores the different levels of randomness you get from highly observed stock indexes depending on the length of time under scrutiny.

item.title: Student Opinion Survey Analysis
item.description: Student Opinion Analysis End-of-semester feedback from students in my "Intro to Data Science" course at ORU. The responses are voluntary and anonymous, and I usually incentivize completion with extra credit, but I still have only gotten around a 70% completion rate since starting the course (about 18 total submissions). If you're viewing on a phone, it looks better in landscape. {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"prompt":["Exams and other means of measuring my performance were relevant to course objectives and course content.
